about_the_game:
About this game

In the game, you play the role of Sima Yu, a junior high school student, meeting and getting acquainted with different beautiful girls in a variety of strange ways, and choosing different branching options to lead to different story lines.
The story type is connection comedy, the plot is humorous, you will have a pleasant and unique game experience.

content_descriptors.notes: There will be pornographic jokes, sexual topics and other adult content in the game, but there will be no sexual behavior.

short_description: In “My Love-Hate Relationship with My Sister”, you will play as a boy named Sima Yu who has a second-year syndrome. You will meet and get to know different girls in a humorous way, and experience school and family life. Make your own choices, experience unique stories, and reach different endings.
